attributes.action: recommend to Parliament that the existing terrorism laws be used to punish directors and senior excutives of failed UK banks that have been bailed out by UK tax payers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The directors and senior directors of failed Uk banks are guilty of causing more damage to UK citizens than any terrorist group and should be dealt with as economic terrorists. They should be arrested and sentenced to jail terms and their assets siezed and recovered. The assest recovery should also apply to close family members.
